com.jme3.input.android

Class AndroidTouchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.input.android.AndroidTouchHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidTouchHandler14

    public class AndroidTouchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    AndroidTouchHandler is the base class that receives touch inputs from the Android system and creates the TouchEvents for jME. This class is designed to handle the base touch events for Android rev 9 (Android 2.3). This is extended by other classes to add features that were introducted after Android rev 9.
